results.title: Learn DevOps: The Complete Kubernetes Course
results.headline: Kubernetes will run and manage your containerized applications. Learn how to build, deploy, use, and maintain Kubernetes
objectives_summary: Install and configure Kubernetes (on your laptop/desktop or production grade cluster on AWS)
Use Docker Client (with kubernetes), kubeadm, kops, or minikube to setup your cluster
Be able to run stateless and stateful applications on Kubernetes

results.title: Docker Mastery: The Complete Toolset From a Docker Captain
results.headline: Build, compose, deploy, and manage Docker containers from development to DevOps based Swarm clusters
objectives_summary: How to use Docker and Compose on your machine for better software building and testing.
Build a fancy multi-node Swarm cluster for production deployments!
Skills to build advanced development environments with your code running in containers.

results.title: Learn Devops: Continuously Deliver Better Software
results.headline: Excel in delivering and deploying software using Git, Vagrant, Chef, Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes
objectives_summary: Apply DevOps in your team
Understand Continuous Delivery
Automate the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)

results.title: Git Complete: The definitive, step-by-step guide to Git

visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.job_title: Lead Software Engineer, Dev Trainer (17 courses,16k reviews)
visible_instructors.title: Jason Taylor

results.headline: Go from zero to hero with Git source control step-by-step with easy to understand examples. Become the next Git expert!
objectives_summary: Learn the key concepts of the Git source control system
Step through the entire Git workflow
Compare the different states in Git and compare between branches and commits

results.title: DevOps: CI/CD using AWS CodePipeline & Elastic Beanstalk
results.headline: Learn Automated Continuous Deployment using AWS CodePipleine, Elastic Beanstalk & Lambda (includes example PHP project).
objectives_summary: Conceptualize and design fully automated continuous integration & deployment pipelines
Use AWS CodePipeline to setup CI/CD pipelines
Use AWS Elastic Beanstalk to deploy applications

results.title: Learning Path: Modern DevOps
results.headline: Move into the modern DevOps world with Git, Docker, and Puppet
objectives_summary: Gain skills in order to add resilient services to your app or infrastructure by learning configuration management, continuous deployment, and other DevOps techniques
Employ the advantageous features of Git in your projects to optimize your workflow
Explore opportunities with Docker to achieve rapid application deployment, reliability, scalability, and portability across machines and clouds

results.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate 2018
results.headline: Want to pass the AWS Solutions Architect - Associate Exam? Want to become Amazon Web Services Certified? Do this course!
objectives_summary: Pass the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate Exam
Design Highly Resilient and Scaleable Websites on AWS
Become Intimately Familiar With The AWS Platform

results.title: Mastering Ansible
results.headline: A complete guide to configuration management and orchestration with Ansible.
objectives_summary: Execute ad-hoc commands against servers using Ansible
Write Ansible configuration playbooks to deploy a 3-tier web application
Configure Ansible roles with tasks, handlers, files, templates, and default variables

results.title: The Docker for DevOps course: From development to production
results.headline: Updated for Docker v17.06. Learn how to build and deploy web applications with Docker in an automated way.
objectives_summary: Learn how to deploy web applications with Docker
Ability to serve your web app securely over SSL (HTTPS)
Confidence to apply for DevOps positions at software companies

Install, configure and develop LogStash data ingestion pipelines
